sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-bread-crumb", templateUrl: "./bread-crumb.component.html", styleUrl: "./bread-crumb.component.scss", }) export class BreadCrumbComponent { @Input() breadcrumbs: { name: string; link: string }[] = []; }
  1. Home
  2. Bhubaneswar
  3. Hotel Sai Nath & Sai Restaurant
